In fermentum laoreet euismod. Praesent sem nisl, facilisis eget odio at, rhoncus scelerisque ipsum. Nulla orci dui, dignissim a risus ut, lobortis porttitor velit. \n\nNulla id lectus metus. Maecenas a lorem in odio auctor facilisis non vitae nunc. Sed malesuada volutpat massa. Praesent sit amet lacinia augue, mollis tempor dolor.
Welcome to the Nachos sample app!

After typing some text, enter any of the following characters to create a chip:

<enter>
Will turn all plain text in the text field into chips

;
Will turn the current token into a chip

<space>
Will turn the text from the beginning of the current token up to the cursor into a chip

You can also touch a chip to edit it
Type to create chips with icons
Touch to steal focus and chipify text
